content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts PR #74340 has been requested for beta backport.

Procedure

Prepare agenda entry:

  • Why nominated?
  • Author, assignee?
  • Important details?

• Fix of a critical bug which leaked into beta
  • PR from davidtwco, reviewed and nominated by pnkfelix
someone already added content, I think it was @pnkfelix
Yeah I just put it on agenda now
this is so cool, I hadn't noticed this part of the bot before
:+1:, just noticed that and I was going to quickly add the content before the meeting :)
the agenda entry is supposed to include the PR author , and the ... PR assignee? Or the PR reviewer?
Including who "r+'ed" the PR does seem like a good thing to point out (the person who r+ed is not necessarily on the assignee list)

pnkfelix said:

the agenda entry is supposed to include the PR author , and the ... PR assignee? Or the PR reviewer?

I'd say we should place there whatever is good to properly explain why was nominated, what is this solving, etc
a short summary to give a clear heads up
then people would need to read the PR for sure :)
